text: RT @FoxNews It's #Festivus, which means @RandPaul is celebrating with the Airing of Grievances. http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2017/12/23/rand-paul-airs-grievances-about-trump-hillary-and-aliens-in-annual-festivus-tradition.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRwfwNZXcAElmQJ.jpg

This Christmas Eve, I’m thinking of the Californians families who lost their homes and their possessions in the wildfires. May they be able to find strength in their community and loved ones.
